AllEventsFilter todo jjs what is this? It is never referenced in this projec
BufferedLog An implementation of Log that writes to a LoggingEventBuffer to prevent log writers from receiving log messages immediately.
EnvironmentVariableEventSet Sets events from the environment variable "EVENT_NAMES" as a comma separated list.
Events Provides a simple static resource for checking if the client has requested a particular "event".
EventsAnnounceThread  
EventSetFilter  
EventsUtil  
LoggingEventBuffer Stores LoggingEvent entries in a LinkedHashMap until the flush method is called.
ModelLogger  
SystemPropertyEventSet Sets events from the System property "EVENT_NAMES" as a comma separated list.
ThreadLogFactory Provides a Log instance that will only print log messages when the flushLogBuffer method or trace("flushLogBuffer") is called.
ThreadLogUtil Provides a ThreadLocal stored instance of a LoggingEventBuffer for use with BufferedLog instances.
 

Package org.javautil.logging Description

Classes for logging in applications, similar to the package java.logging. This package is based on the concept of events which are both finer grained than the various logger levels as they can be used to toggle the reporting of specific actions. Events are also cross cutting in that an event may be in multiple methods, classes, even packages. These methods are an extension of the Event mechanism from dbexperts and subsume that effort. todo need example usage
